thread.section_title: Holiday Inn New York City - Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The view was awesome
thread.title_full: The view was awesome - Review of Holiday Inn New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: cuinthemoon
title: The view was awesome
text:
This is a new Holiday inn which is situated on a small footprint, thus it has a small lobby and only 2 elevators which are used by housekeeping and made a small elevator even smaller. It would be nice if there was floor indicator for the elevator while you are waiting. It can take a long time for the upper floors to get an elevator.
The room was modern, small but comfortable. Was most impressed with the view and close proximity to so many attractions.
